main event: A series of UFO sightings reported in Colorado Springs, Colorado, in March 1967.
interesting points: The object reportedly came straight down and disappeared behind trees.,Witnesses observed various colored orange objects that appeared to be balloons.,One observer indicated that they had watched a course in astronomy and worked in an observatory.,The sightings involved multiple witnesses who provided similar reports of what they saw.,Conclusions varied between an astro meteor and unidentified balloons.
witness description: One observed worked in an observatory and studied astronomy.
